sourcesContent: import{isMac as t}from"../utils/collections";import{KeyMod as r}from"./codes";export const getCtrlKeysByPlatform=()=>({CtrlCmd:t()?"metaKey":"ctrlKey",WinCtrl:t()?"ctrlKey":"metaKey"});export const getActiveModMap=t=>{const e=t.filter((t=>!!r[t])),o={CtrlCmd:!1,Shift:!1,Alt:!1,WinCtrl:!1};return e.forEach((t=>{const e=r[t];o[e]=!0})),o};
